DPRK and UNICEF sign plans for cooperation for 2003 
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Su Hon, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, in his capacity as chairman of the national co-ordinating committee for UNICEF in the DPRK, and Richard Bridle, UNICEF representative, signed the joint project plans of the year 2003 on Feb. 10.
 In 2003 UNICEF will continue to support humanitarian and development activities aimed at fulfillment of children's rights to a total of us 12.3 million, subject to availability of funds.

Floral basket to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was presented to Kim Jong Il by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of his birthday.
 Wu Donghe, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK, conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned today.
